TextField.Name: NAME

Trigger.Name: TR_USR_PROSPECTTERMINATE_BUSINESSPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE
Trigger.Description: Used to delete the common business process records associated with this record.
Trigger.CreateTriggerSQL:
create trigger TR_USR_PROSPECTTERMINATE_BUSINESSPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE on dbo.USR_PROSPECTTERMINATE_BUSINESSPROCESS after delete not for replication as begin
delete from dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE where BUSINESSPROCESSPARAMETERSETID in (select ID from deleted) and BUSINESSPROCESSCATALOGID = '94B4AA0A-06F6-4E6C-A569-809EF942DA6E'; -- guid is the ID from business process spec - see SponsorTerminate.BusinessProcess.xml end
